transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir, main Nidhi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. 
Customer: Ji, ji boliye.
Executive: Ji, ji Wasim ji baat kar rahe hai na?
Customer: Nafees baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan sir aapki jaise kal hamari baat hui thi aap share karne wale the WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Jab bhi call karenge aap mera hi call karenge ya pehle number pe mera naam likh dijiye.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Aap pehle number pe mera naam likh lijiye.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Matlab ye dono number aapke hi hai na 87780 wala?
Customer: Haan aur waha mera naam likh dijiye aap.
Executive: Maine aapko jo group hamara bana hua hai na usme aapke dono number edit hai.
Customer: Haan to group me dono number hai aur jab bhi call karenge aap mai hi uthaunga koi aur nahi uthayega.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Wo mera chota bhai hai Wasim wo nahi uthayega call.
Executive: Achha wo aapke chhote bhai hai Wasim ji?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Chaliye main to hamesha is number pe call karti hu to matlab Wasim ji baat karte hai. Shayad mujhe laga inka ye number hoga.
Customer: Wo baat hi nahi karega hamesha mai hi baat karta hu.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Jitni baar aapne call uthaya mai hi baat karta hu. Kal bhi parso bhi narso bhi jitni dealing hui hai mere se hi hoti hai.
Executive: Achha achha achha. To sir aapka naam?
Customer: Mohammad Nafees naam hai mera.
Executive: Nafees. Okay. Thik hai. Kal bhi mere se hi baat hua tha aapka.
Executive: Achha achha achha. Nahi isme yaha pe wo aapke account me likha aata hai na Mohammad Wasim Raja to mujhe usse yaad rehta hai. Fir matlab jab bhi maine call kara hai to aapne yahi bola hai ki ha Wasim hi baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Nahi Nafees bolta hu mai Nafees baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Thik hai mai next time. Apna naam batata hu Nafees baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai mai next time se bilkul dhyan rakhungi is cheez ka.
Executive: Thik hai. So waha pe aap change kar dijiye Nafees likh dijiye hata dijiye us naam se. Aapko yaad karne ka zarurat nahi padega.
Executive: Isme GST me kya naam hai is GST pe?
Customer: Mera naam hai GST me mera naam hai. Mere naam hi GST hai.
Executive: Haan Mohammad Nasif karke aa raha hai.
Customer: Hmm to mere naam se hai GST to mera hi naam aayega.
Executive: Thik hai mai ek baar iska check kar leti hu. Mai agar ye naam ho sakta hai update to mai iska kar deti hu update.
Executive: Ji. So jaise kal hamari baat hui thi services ke regarding. Jo buyleads me aap share karne wale the screenshot uska aapne abhi tak share nahi kara.
Customer: Haan mai kar de raha hu abhi do minute rukiye mai aapko bhej raha hu. Ek minute me bhej raha hu.
Executive: Haan group to pata hi hai na. Yaad aayega tab mai ek baar mujhe yaad bhi karna hoga maine bataya tha to mai bhejta hu abhi aapko thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Ek baar. Mai ek baar dobara se group. Group pe message karu?
Customer: Aap group pe hi haay bhej do to mujhe aasaani rahega dhundhne me.
Executive: Thik hai ek second.
Executive: Ek baar dekhiye group. Ek baar dekhiye group pe message kara hai maine.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Chaliye mai bhej raha hu aapko.
Executive: Haan aap mujhe uska share karke aap mujhe dono ka share karega. Matlab.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants his name on first number.

- Customer has not shared buyleads screenshot.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to update name in account.

- Customer agreed to share screenshot in 2 minutes.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- name update, buyleads, screenshot, gst
